title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-2.22 - Required uniform
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-2.22 - Required uniform

State Regulations
A
required uniform
shall be that
clothing worn by an employee, at the request of the employer, wh ile performing
job-related duties or to comply with any State, city or local law, rule or
regulation. It does not, however, include clothing that may be worn as part of
an employee's ordinary wardrobe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
142-2.22

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
